name: Innovation Brewing
description: Local brewery and taproom offering craft beers and pub fare in a relaxed atmosphere.

name: City Lights Cafe
description: Cozy cafe serving coffee, breakfast, sandwiches, and local craft beer with occasional live music.

name: Lulu's on Main
description: Eclectic restaurant serving creative American cuisine with vegetarian options in an artistic setting.

name: O'Malley's Pub and Grill
description: Irish pub offering traditional pub fare, craft beers, and sports viewing.

name: White Moon Cafe & Dark Moon Cocktail Bar
description: Coffee shop and cafe offering breakfast, lunch, and specialty coffee drinks.

name: Mad Batter Food & Film
description: Unique restaurant combining dining with movie screenings, serving American cuisine and craft beer.

name: Cosmic Carryout
description: Late-night takeout spot offering burgers, sandwiches, and comfort food.

name: Bread Heads Tiki Shak
description: Tropical-themed eatery serving fresh bread, sandwiches, and tiki-inspired drinks in a laid-back atmosphere.

name: The Cut Cocktail Lounge
description: A charming waterin' hole in Sylva, NC, serving craft cocktails, cold beer and delicious snacks

name: Lazy Hiker Brewing - Sylva Taproom
description: In 2019 Lazy Hiker expanded and opened a taproom with Mad Batter Kitchen in beautiful downtown Sylva, NC. You can find Lazy Hiker beer in many stores, bottle shops, and restaurants throughout Western North Carolina and North Georgia.  We invite hikers and travelers of every sort to come 'Get Lazy' with us!

name: Foragers Canteen
description: Relaxed restaurant near the Great Smoky Mountain Railroad dishing up comfort food and vegetarian fare, plus beer, wine, and cocktails.

name: ILDA
description: We welcome you to enjoy our rustic Italian-Appalachian cuisine along side inventive craft cocktails and unique wines in the very heart of downtown Sylva. Ilda is the artisan passion project of husband & wife team Chef Santiago Guzzetti and Sommelier Crystal Pace. Nestled in the Smokey Mountains of Western North Carolina, the pair felt called to build a home that is rich in culture, craft and community. Santiago's heritage in Italian cuisine and Crystal's ties to her hometown of Appalachia create a cuisine that is unique, but also honors and respects history. This union of Italian and Southern Appalachian cuisine is the foundation where they will recreate the comfort you found at your grandmother's kitchen table.

name: Santé The Wine Bar
description: Located directly next door to Ilda, Santé is the culmination of Sommelier Crystal Pace's passion for unique, top shelf wines. Visit us to indulge in wine by the glass or by the bottle, thoughtfully paired with tapas and charcuterie from Ilda. Discover a new favorite? Guests are welcome to purchase and take home wine by the bottle or by the case. We even host a variety of rotating events and tastings featuring special guests, live music, and more. Featuring a relaxed vibe, true to the heart of downtown Sylva, and a welcoming family of fellow wine lovers, there's no better destination to kick back, relax, and wine a little.

name: Meatballs Pizzeria
description: Our story hails from a wild Italian woman who changed a town forever. A family meatball recipe carried Karen Martar from New York to the mountain town of Sylva, where she opened the aptly named Meatballs in 1983. Serving up delicious pizza and the mouthwatering meatballs she learned to make from her family, her restaurant was a staple on Main Street for 17 years: so much so that having your picture displayed on the wall was considered "One of the most esteemed status symbols of the time" by locals.

name: Balsam Falls Brewing Co.
description: Balsam Falls is the true definition of a labor of love. Opened by Husband and Wife, Corey and Laurie Bryson in October 2017, who have since poured their love for craft beer and the community into their business. Known for their creative beer flavors and styles, delicious eats and big personalities, Balsam Falls Brewing Co. is always a joyful place to be. In addition, we regularly push the boundaries and brew unique beers with very limited availability. Drink Fresh, Drink local. Drink Sylva Beer!

name: The Coffee Shop
description: Homestyle southern cuisine at a reasonable price with friendly service and hometown atmosphere.

name: Martha's Place 553
description: All inclusive restaurant and bar offering good vibes, great food, libations and friendly faces! Private Event space available as well!

name: Lucy in the Rye
description: Scratch made breakfast and lunch in historic downtown Sylva, NC
